title: The Haunting of Graves' Landing
description: In the tradition of Barbara Michaels and Phyllis Whitney, GRAVES'S LANDING is a novel of romantic suspense and the paranormal. Abigail Graves inherits the notorious estate built by her ancestor, Hezekiah Graves, with the money he stole from the followers he led into the wilderness and abandoned. She must spend a week at the estate in order to inherit ever mindful that legend says the souls of Hezekiah's victims haunt the estate hungering for the blood of his last descendant to set them free. Family legend says the souls of Hezekiah's descendants will burn in Hell until the blood of the last of his line is spilled at Graves' Landing. With Abby is her free-spirited cousin, Cat, Nick Jeffries, an author of non-fiction dealing with the paranormal, and his team. They are joined by Abby's philandering ex-husband, Vinnie Zanetti who, having heard of Abby's inheritance, seeks to charm his way back into her life, and into a share of her legacy.
author: Sandra Dubay
